solution_line_template: The total number of calories he gets per day is {calories_per_burger} x {burgers_per_day} = <<{calories_per_burger}*{burgers_per_day}={calories_per_day}>>{calories_per_day}.
Therefore the total number of calories he will get after {num_days} days is {calories_per_day} x {num_days} = <<{calories_per_day}*{num_days}={total_calories}>>{total_calories}.
